name: Create a Pipedrive CRM person and a deal from aÂ Google Ads Lead Forms submission
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

Every time a new Google Ads Lead form is submitted, Make will automatically create a new person and a new deal in Pipedrive. 

The template expects your lead form to collect at least these fields:
1) Full Name
2) User Email
3) User Phone
